ExportResources.name: KAVAT GENETIC CODE
ExportResources.description: Contains the genetic code sequence of a Kavat.

ExportResources.name: KUBROW EGG
ExportResources.description: This egg is used to transplant the genetic code of a Kubrow onto a Kubrow clone.

ExportResources.name: GENETIC CODE TEMPLATE
ExportResources.description:
Copies the dominant genes of a pet onto the template. 
This can then be used to increase the chances that traits from the original pet will carry across to a newborn clone.

ExportResources.description: This device facilitates the growth of a Kubrow clone, from birth to puppyhood.

ExportResources.name: NAI-ZHEN KUBROW COLLAR

ExportResources.name: DNA STABILIZERS

ExportResources.name: VAPOR SPECTER REGIMENT
ExportResources.description: An army composed of vapor-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for one conflict.

ExportResources.name: FORCE SPECTER REGIMENT
ExportResources.description: An army composed of force-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for three conflicts.

ExportResources.name: COSMIC SPECTER REGIMENT
ExportResources.description: An army composed of cosmic-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for four conflicts.

ExportResources.name: PHASE SPECTER REGIMENT
ExportResources.description: An army composed of phase-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for two conflicts.

ExportResources.name: HEMOCYTE CYSTOLITH
